Context: STZ and wild-type (WT) mice were orally administered P. gingivalis (STZPg, WTPg) or saline (STZco, WTco).
Materials and Methods Mice Four-week-old male wild-type (WT) C57BL/6J mice were obtained from Sankyo Labo Service Corporation, Inc.
